Rest your body, restore your energy and take the next step of your journey! 
 
On top of quality rooms and services designed for backpackers, the Wanderer provides a warm and friendly environment with spacious common areas to encourage guests to mingle, relax and exchange their traveling experiences with like-minded people. 
 
Whether you're here for a short or long stay, we hope you'll fall in love with this place and make it your home in Taipei. 
 
Refresh your spirits for the journey ahead!

- 24-Hour Reception 
- Free Maps 
- Free Wi-Fi 
- Free Shared Kitchen 
- Key Card Access 
- Personal Locker
